- Added `packages/components/tabs/examples/lit/Tabs.ts(.astro)` implementing a `destyler-tabs` custom element powered by `MachineController`, `ControlsController`, and `tabsData`, matching the existing frameworks’ structure (indicator, list, triggers, contents, Agnes input) and exposing layout/toolbar/state visualizer just like combobox/color-picker demos.
- Added `packages/components/tabs/examples/vanilla/Tabs.ts(.astro)` that renders the same markup via the shared `Component` helper, wires root/indicator/list/trigger/content nodes to the tabs API, keeps `tabsControls` in sync, and feeds updates into the vanilla toolbar + state visualizer.
- Registered both examples inside Storybook via `lit.stories.ts` and `vanilla.stories.ts`, so they appear alongside the other framework stories.
